text: Va ʙa jod ovared, (ej mū'minon), ne'matero, ki ʙar şumo arzonī kard, on zamonero, ki andak ʙuded va dar şumori xorşudagoni in sarzamini Makka ʙuded va ʙimi on doşted, ki mardum şumoro az mijon ʙardorand va Alloh panohaton dod dar Madina va jorī kard va pirūzaton gardonid dar Badr va az cizhoi pokiza rūziaton dod, ʙoşad, ki şukrguzorī kuned
